alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Natrona and southeastern Fremont Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 143 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a convective line along a strong cold front from eastern Fremont County through Natrona County, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Emigrant Gap around 200 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Mills, Red Butte, Paradise Valley and Beartrap Meadows County Park. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 176 and 218. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County; Wind River Basin
